title: Mr. Attaf receives a congratulatory message from his Emirati counterpart
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr. Ahmed Attaf, received a phone call from his brother, the Minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of the United Arab Emirates brothers, His Highness Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed Al-Nahyane who congratulated him on his appointment by the President of the Republic at the head of Algerian diplomacy, wishing him full success in the exercise of his duties.

The two ministers reviewed, on this occasion, the evolution of Algerian-Emirati relations, emphasizing the concern of the Presidents of the two countries to strengthen and enhance bilateral cooperation in the economic component, and to intensify political consultation on issues of common interest, including those related to joint Arab action.
